messages.title: An important message about the Lib Dems
messages.content: On top of his admission of admiration for Thatcher, the Lib Dem leader also claims his policies are more in line with Thatcher's than those of today's Tories. In September last year, the new Lib Dem leader called for 'savage' cuts to public spending.

messages.title: Lib Dem leader: Thatcher was right
messages.content: My admiration for Thatcher, by Clegg.

messages.title: The Lib Dems will not rule out cuts to frontline services.
Vote Lib Dem get Tory...
messages.content: Nick Clegg is refusing to rule out a back room deal to put the Tories into power. Many Lib Dem voters would be horrified to watch the Lib Dems hand power to the Tories.

images.caption: Nick Clegg will back Tories in hung Parliament - 18 May 2009, Daily Telegraph
Clegg could support Tories in a minority government - 19 Mar 2010, The Independent
Clegg reveals Lib Dems are prepared to back Cameron - 23 Nov 2009, The Independent

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet seems to be focused on the Liberal Democratic Party's leader Nick Clegg and his position on cuts to public spending as well as his reported willingness to support the Conservative Party in a hung parliament.
